TunableList.name: ATTRACTOR_OBJECT_TAGS
TunableList.description: One or more tags that indicate an object is a type of attractor point. We use attractor points to push Sims near things and reference specific geography in the world.

TunableList.name: SPAWN_POINT_ATTRACTORS
TunableList.description: Mapping from spawn point tags to attractor objects so we can create attractor points at spawn points.

Tunable.name: attractor point definition
Tunable.description: The object we want to create on the Spawn Point.

TunableEnum.name: spawn point tag
TunableEnum.description: The tag on the spawn point.
